name: 摸鱼拼图/Easy Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
A work fishing tool that combines traditional puzzles with less serious ones.

1. Traditional puzzle: divided into squares and triangles, with 16/49/100/225 puzzle pieces available for selection. Players can adjust the auxiliary system of the puzzle in the settings.

2. Circle Puzzle: Divide a square drawing into multiple identical square blocks, and players can rotate all blocks by clicking on them to complete the puzzle.

3. Wheel Puzzle: Divide a circular puzzle into multiple circles, and clicking on any of them will drive the associated circles to rotate. If all the circular arrows are consistent, the puzzle is completed.
